programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:

Année : 13

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
After a motorbike accident leaves outdoor enthusiast Ryan paralysed, he adapts with a change in career and is planning for his wedding day.

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Following a spinal cord injury, young Tauranga man Sam Fitness has found a clever way to continue to enjoy his passion for fishing.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Postcards From ...
programme.desc:
Host Alex Smyth explores the many lakeside towns that make up Ontario's most popular cottage destination - the Muskoka region.
Année : 2011

programme.title: AMI This Week - From The Vault
programme.desc:
Chris Vallée meets para-athlete and blind golfer Kevin Frost, to learn about a growing organization called Ontario Visually Impaired Golfers. Then, Grant Hardy chats with the author of The Disability Experience: Working Towards Belonging.
Année : 2011

programme.title: AMI This Week
programme.desc:
(S10EP30) Jillian Gillis and Grant Hardy review the ReVision Fitness App created by Tyler Merren. Then, Alex Smyth gets a lesson in using a white cane with the help of orientation and mobility specialist Anita Laurnitus.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kiesha's Story
programme.desc:
Follow Kiesha, who is a vibrant 24-year-old incomplete quadriplegic focused on regaining her strength and retraining her muscle memory as she empowers herself to access health care services in Alberta.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Across The Line
programme.desc:
Across The Line follows the Canadian Wheelchair Rugby team as they compete to qualify for the 2020 Tokyo Paralympic Games.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Pre-Christmas Juanita Willems is flat out, collecting, wrapping and distributing presents for foster children, even though Juanita is blind.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
As their Outward Bound adventure continues, a group of people living with physical disabilities tackle their fear of heights, and a challenging waka journey.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Le grand miracle
programme.desc:

programme.desc:
